name: Sayre Land Company v. Sayre Borough, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Sayre Land Co. v. Sayre Borough

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Citidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
parties: Sayre Land Company v. Sayre Borough, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Roseneield reported in 5 D. & C. 2d 294.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Maurice L. Epstein, Special Counsel, with him Edward C. O’Connor, Borough Solicitor, for appellant.
J ames W. Cullen, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sayre Land Company v. Sayre Borough, Appellant.
Argued January 11, 1956.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Citidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Maurice L. Epstein, Special Counsel, with him Edward C. O’Connor, Borough Solicitor, for appellant.
J ames W. Cullen, for appellee.
March 13, 1956:
